intro: Endlicheria argentea, commonly known as silverleaf endlicheria, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its silver-gray foliage, which gives it its common name. It produces showy, pinkish-white flowers that bloom in summer. Endlicheria argentea is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and greenhouses.
